name: bun-bench-tasks
description: Synthetic benchmark tasks for evaluating AI on Bun.js

scripts.test:all: for dir in tasks/task-*; do echo "Testing $dir..."; cd $dir && bun test 2>/dev/null || true; cd ../..; done
scripts.test:solutions: for dir in tasks/task-*; do echo "Testing solution in $dir..."; cd $dir && cp -r solution/* src/ 2>/dev/null && bun test; cd ../..; done
